website_summaries.verdict: This lip primer helps prevent lip color from feathering and bleeding, and it moisturizes too. Just be sure to let it dry fully before you apply your lipstick or it may affect the color.
pros: Prevents lip color from feathering and bleeding, especially when applied over lips and just outside lip line
Swivel-style tube allows for easy application
Prevents feathering even after drinking hot beverages
cons: Primer stick can be a bit hard and challenging to spread on lips

customer_reviews.title: Just love this product and hope the company does not change ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 66 years old and have lip lines that cause feathering no matter what lip pencils and lipstick adhesives I have purchased. I bought this product about a month ago and have used it daily and it works! It's the only product I have ever used that not only prevents my lipstick from feathering in general, but even holds my lipstick residual in place without feathering even after drinking hot beverages. Just love this product and hope the company does not change the formula or take it off the market.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: I do not use any cosmetics or consume any products from this country. There have been far too many animal and human injuries and deaths caused by fradulant practices.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly McFee

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for women in their 40's and up!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I have fine lines that lipstick likes to seep in to and I hate it! Now, I apply this just outside of my natural lip line, then apply my lipstick and I have no feathering for hours! It is an absolute must have for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shana A. Wood

customer_reviews.title: This lipstick is marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is marvelous! I use it to keep my colored lipstick from traveling up my lip wrinkles. Must use this base lipstick first if I want to look good and not like some kind of crazy person with lipstick all over around my mouth. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Nxtdrneghber

customer_reviews.title: Have only used a few days and am very pleased. Looks like I won't have to deal with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not really sure this product would help. Have only used a few days and am very pleased. Looks like I won't have to deal with a lip liner any more. This not only moisturizes but keeps lipstick where it should be. So glad I found it.......and at a reasonible price.
customer_reviews.author: JayW

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works! This definitely keeps my lipstick from feathering around my upper lip. Some reviews state it keeps your lip color on all day, mine didn’t do that but I still liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie L.

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but container broke in first week
customer_reviews.text: This product performs as I would want it to; much better than other brands. I gave it 2 stars because the case is very fragile and shattered the first week (The clear part of the cover.) This is a problem because I can't keep the moisturizing stick covered and, more importantly, can't travel with it. Please strengthen the case ! I want to use your product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgenmuffel

customer_reviews.title: Useful product, hard to find elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: At a certain stage in life many women find that their lipstick "bleeds" in unattractive lines outward from their lips, especially after eating a meal. If you apply this product--a little beyond your lips all around--before you apply lipstick, it does not bleed. You can find other products advertised to do the same thing that are harder to apply and cost more. This one is inexpensive, easy to apply, and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I found the product years ago, loved it then and love it now. It works like no other anti-feathering lip base I've ever used. It's far cheaper than most like type products and works great. Glad to see the same product still on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Cmas2020

customer_reviews.title: Good Lipstick Sealer, or moisturizer.  No on stopping Lipstick feathering.
customer_reviews.text: I don't find this product to be anti-feathering for the over forty crowd at all. However I do like it as a lipstick sealer. I use a brow wax stick to line the lips to prevent feathering. That works. Mac has the best brow wax stick but it is pricy. Have been experimenting with cheaper brow wax sticks, so far nothing touches Mac.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Anything I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I am 79 years old with lots of wrinkles around my mouth. This lip base definitely reduces the bleeding and feathering of lipstick. I will buy i again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick base
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick base is fantastic. It makes my lipstick stay on for hours longer than it would without. It is also very moisturizing, so sometimes I just use it like a chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Salsera

customer_reviews.title: glides on
customer_reviews.text: I like the product... have to be careful how you take off the lid, apply, put lid back on because product does not retract into the case
customer_reviews.author: JPeters

customer_reviews.title: It works but broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This works 'ok' but the lipstick broke off at the base with only two uses. I'm still using it but it should hold up better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your LipLiner within the Lines!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and have found that it keeps my lipliner cleanly within the lines presented over the lip base. It is the only product that I have been happy with and continue to use daily! Dr. Yvonne Katz

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti-feathering Lip Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this anti-feathering lip moisturizer. It really works!! I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is moisturizing, but it makes it difficult to get the lipstick to go on your lips.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Soft, Supple Lips
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this product reduce feathering of lipstick around the lips, but it is a soft balm that keeps your lips soft and supple. I wear it beneath lipstick or alone as it's colorless. Just a wonderful product that I've been using for years.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Lipstick stays on and it doesn’t dry out your lips.

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years, as it is marketed under at least three brands. It is wonderful for lines around the mouth to keep lipstick from bleeding. However, this brand is nearly three times the price of the other one I have . I ordered this one to make sure it was the same product and it is.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was looking for something that moisten my very dry lips so I thought I would try this lipstick. I love it! I think it works better than Chapstick. It moistens my lips and doesn't leave them dried out like Chapstick. I've ordered twice before and when I use this up I will be back a third time!

Without this product, my lipstick runs up the creases and looks terrible, but this product has saved me and keeps the lipstick where it belongs.

customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I've been using it since I was in my 40s. Now I'm in my 60s and it still does the trick.

customer_reviews.title: lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: By sheer accident I ran out of this product before I received new ones and out of desperation tried chapstick type product as primer for lipstick. And guess what? It does the same thing that this stuff does for only a dollar! Guess I should have made the connection between wax products before, but I did not. Nothing wrong with this product, but it is overpriced and unnecessary, plus you have to wait for delivery!!
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After all of the rave reviews of this "Anti-Feather" lip base, I am greatly disappointed. Since it hasn't stopped my lipstick from bleeding/feathering, I thought I'd just use it as a moisturizing balm, like ChapStik. Further disappointment: if anything, my lips feel even dryer than before I began using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best lipstick base I have ever bought. I've spent 4 times as much money on the more popular brands and they either made my lips feel dried out, or really sticky and uncomfortable. This provides a smooth, soft feel that holds your color in place and keeps it vivid all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: THE one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used high end lip primers that would crumble and were too expensive. This product works! I'm a singer and it keeps my lips set through an entire set. It moisturizes my lips, too, which are prone to drying, cracking, and bleeding! Very impressed. Keep this in stock, please!!
customer_reviews.author: JaeJay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The greatest find of my life. This is how you apply lipstick.

customer_reviews.text: I would recomend this product to everyone I have used this product for several years and it does the job

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: As a former smoker, I have many creases above and below my lips that lipstick "runs" into. This product stops that.

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: So much she asked for another tube this year. I'm getting her 2, because she said each tube lasts about 9 months. That's close to a year but not the whole cigar! My mom wears lipstick every single day, so kudos to this product for lasting so long and being so awesome. My mom is a TOUGH critic.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lip moisturizer for a few months and I LOVE it! I use it mostly for when my lips are dry. It works better than Chapstick! I use it under my lipstick too.I've been looking for something to moisturize my dry chapped lips for a while and now I found it with this! Love it! I will be buying this again!

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find the Irene Gari Anti Feather Lip Base again. The store where I used to purchase it didn't carry it anymore. I really missed it because I believe it does keep my lipstick :"in line".

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders and it's only a lipstick sized product. I used it in conjunction with other creams but this is the one I carry in my purse. Great customer service.

customer_reviews.title: its ok

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and would buy it in my local beauty supply store. When I was down to my last tube I went to buy more only to find out that it was no longer carried and the saleswoman had no idea what I was talking about. I tried several "on line" places with no luck and Amazon was a last ditch effort. It really keeps lipstick from "bleeding" into those fine lines around the mouth ... try it - you will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Anti-feather base

customer_reviews.title: Product rating
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. It arrived promptly and performed exactly as described. It met all my expectations. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Really stops lipstick from running into fine lines like no other product

customer_reviews.title: Irene Gari Anti Feathering Lip Base
customer_reviews.text: I have spent months looking for an anti feathering lip base that works, and this one really does the trick. It is more moisturizing than I am used to, but it works great when used with a cream foundation over the lip base and a lip pencil to define... no more bleeding lipstick!!
customer_reviews.author: rnbjj

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with Irene Gari Anti Feather lip base
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this lip base as I have in the past, but it seemed a lot more moisturizing and it did not control the feathering. My lips felt too wet to have my lipstick not run. I would not buy this again, my lipstick looked sloppy after an hour and the color bled. Not a good look.
customer_reviews.author: loso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip base. It works great and it's light on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Wipert

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I bought a cheapo lipstick that bleeds like crazy. I would throw it out, but for the fact that the color looks terrific on me and I can't quite find the right color in a higher quality lipstick. This base makes the lipstick stay put; no bleeding, feathering or sliding. Today is the second day I'm using it with the cheap lipstick and I'm very satisfied with its performance. It goes on sort of creamy and velvety, not like a lip gloss. I think it gives the lipstick staying power as well, because I only have to reapply after lunch and it looks great until I wipe it off when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: QueensGirl

customer_reviews.title: ... years noticed that's when I first purchased and I love this. I am 56 years old and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used for 2 years noticed that's when I first purchased and I love this . I am 56 years old and have one corner of my mouth that tends to bleed my lipstick. This stops it completely and last all day for me. A must for us getting lip lines. I noticed it's an Amazon choice. Make sense it works, its inexpensive, and they will send prime. I'm ordering 2 tubes now.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: This lip base is perfect for keeping your lipstick in place
customer_reviews.text: This lip base is perfect for keeping your lipstick in place! It also has a pleasant scent of vanilla and coconut, which I like. It does however, change the look of your lipstick slightly. When lipstick is applied over it, the lipstick color seems a bit more sheer than it normally is. It doesn't bother me though as I don't always like a heavy lip look anyway. It's very moisturizing as well.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I put it on, put on my favorite cheep red lipstick and it doesn't bleed! I went to lunch, ate and looked in the mirror and no feathering. I just reapplied my lipstick (cause I left the product at home) and it still worked. When I got home at 6pm and looked in the mirror, still no feathering. WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: Feathering lips, (from smoking cigarettes), is/was a problem for this Elder, so I discovered this excellent product & have been happy every since I discovered it some years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Winona J.

customer_reviews.title: Try it it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered. I’ve tried orher items and color that supposedly stay put and don’t bleed up the edges. But this stuff works and it conditions the skin. It also feels very nice. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Numonik

customer_reviews.title: It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I. am sensitive to most perfumes, and at first I did not like the fragrance of this product. But it worked so well that I became used to the fragrance which I detect only upon applying. It does a superb job of keeping lips from bleeding into fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: H. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Hot Beginnings
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my lipstick base, so my lipstick will not feather above the lipliner and bleed on other skin. It works well, especially because when I received it, melting had occurred , but I just put it together and works good now.

customer_reviews.title: For lipstick smearing
customer_reviews.text: Really works to keep your lipstick from smearing, though the capsule it comes in is cheap and breaks apart eventually. Good value, good product.

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for me at keeping any of my lipstick from bleeding up into those awful lines above and below my lips! The Scent is a bit 'different', but don't notice it later on. I'm a repeat customer now! (Price is a bit higher than I think a product like this should be, but it works well!)

Lipstick and lipliner go on smoother and there's no running vertically. It's as necessary to me as moisturizer!

customer_reviews.text: I love it. Helps keeps lipstick on while eating and drinking. I can go all day without re-applying.

customer_reviews.text: This goes on smoothly, and actually works, by controlling lipstick from wicking into wrinkles above lips...

customer_reviews.title: Stops bleeding of lipstick into wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product over 3 decades. It keeps my lipstick from bleeding. NOTHING works as good as this!

product_meta.title: Irene Gari Anti - Feathering Lip Base 15 ounce
product_meta.description: Lipstick will stay put and last longer! No more smudges or feathery lines. Irene Gari Anti-Feathering Lip Base is your key to gorgeous lips! Apply lipstick base beneath your favorite lipstick for smudge-free color that lasts. You can eat, sip, chew, and chat knowing your lipstick will stay in place all day.
feature_bullets: Lipstick will stay put and last longer! No more smudges or feathery lines
Irene Gari Anti Feathering Lip Base is your key to gorgeous lips
You can eat, sip, chew, and chat knowing your lipstick will stay in place all day
Apply lipstick base beneath your favorite lipstick for smudge free color that lasts
